original_title: Louis(e) de Ville, portrait d'une bad girl
overview: Louis(e) de Ville is an actress, sex educator, author, and american burlesque performer. Follow her as she performs in burlesque shows throughout Europe and for the run of her one woman show: Betty Speaks!; from glamour to trash, from on stage to backstage, join her as she explores and explodes the codes of gender and feminism.
title: Louis(e) de Ville, portrait d'une bad girl
